whyChooseUs.title: FLYGORA TRAVEL
whyChooseUs.subtitle: THE LEADING LOCAL FOOD TOUR COMPANY
whyChooseUs.description: At Flygora, we craft Vietnamese culinary journeys designed exclusively for small groups and teambuilding activities. We will take you deep into the local culture, savoring unique and quintessential dishes that most tourists never discover. With a commitment to green, sustainable tourism and 5-star service standards, Flygora guarantees an experience that is not only delicious but also premium and meaningful.

Our_Advantage.title: Why Flygora is Your Best Choice for Culinary Travel in Vietnam ?

UniqueExperience.title: Unique Experience
UniqueExperience.content: Discover the identity of local cuisine through meticulously selected dishes, where every flavor is a delightful surprise, blended with refined and attentive service.

ExclusiveTour.title: Exclusive Tour
ExclusiveTour.content: Every journey with Flygora is a one-of-a-kind experience. We lead you to the 'hidden gems' of local cuisine – exquisite delicacies that are not found on the typical tourist map.

FoodSafety.title: Food Safety
FoodSafety.content: We are committed to food safety, using fresh, clean ingredients with transparent origins. Please inform us in advance of any allergies or special dietary requirements.

SustainableDevelopment.title: Sustainable Development
SustainableDevelopment.content: We are committed to protecting the environment and supporting local communities through sustainable practices.

safetyCommitment.title: Important Notes for Your Food Tour with Flygora
safetyCommitment.quote: Food Quality and Safety are Our Top Priority
safetyCommitment.description: At Flygora, we follow a rigorous inspection process, from selecting ingredients with transparent origins to ensuring the quality of the final dish. We are committed to making sure every meal you enjoy on our journey adheres to the highest standards of food safety and hygiene. Furthermore, our team of guides is professionally trained and knowledgeable about the ingredients in every dish. Please share any allergies or special dietary requirements with us in advance. This allows Flygora to make the most thoughtful preparations to ensure your culinary experience is both complete and memorable.

teamBuilding.title: Team Building Tours
teamBuilding.subtitle: Kickstart team collaboration with exciting challenges

description.paragraph1: Redefine what a teambuilding event can achieve. With Flygora Travel, your corporate retreat becomes a powerful strategic investment in your company's culture and success. Drawing on years of expertise, we meticulously design itineraries where luxury is the setting for real connection and growth.
description.paragraph2: Our seamless, 24/7 logistical support ensures a flawless experience, allowing your team the freedom to innovate without distraction. Rewarding them with opulent 5-star accommodations and curated gourmet dining isn't just a perk—it's a powerful statement that you value excellence. Choose the VIP experience that delivers tangible returns in morale, motivation, and team cohesion.

guestReview.title: Explore Hanoi - The Thousand-Year-Old City
guestReview.subtitle: Hanoi - Where History Meets Modernity
guestReview.description: Hanoi, the capital of Vietnam, is a city where ancient history meets modern vibrancy. Steeped in over a thousand years of culture, Hanoi offers a rich blend of historical sites, colonial architecture, and modern-day charm. From the bustling streets of the Old Quarter, with its narrow alleys and traditional markets, to the serene beauty of Hoan Kiem Lake and its surrounding temples, Hanoi offers a deep dive into Vietnam's heritage. Visitors can explore historical landmarks like the Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum, the Temple of Literature, and the Imperial Citadel of Thang Long, while also enjoying the lively atmosphere of modern cafes, art galleries, and shopping districts. Whether you're savoring traditional Vietnamese dishes at local eateries or taking a stroll through leafy boulevards, Hanoi provides an unforgettable experience where the past and present coexist harmoniously.

footerIntro.description: Experience the True Taste of Vietnam: We take you on a culinary journey far beyond the familiar favorites like Pho and Banh Mi, deep into the heart of Vietnam’s authentic food culture. You'll get to savor 'hidden gem' dishes from treasured family recipes that have been perfected over generations. Experience the pure, original flavors of Vietnam, crafted from the best ingredients sourced directly from local communities.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Important information for your trip
faq.question1: What happens if bad weather causes tour cancellation?
faq.answer1: If we have to cancel a tour due to weather, we will notify you as soon as possible and provide alternative options at no additional cost, such as alternative tours, new dates or full refunds.
faq.question2: How to avoid storms and lightning in tours?
faq.answer2: We are aware of the potential risks associated with storms and lightning and have strict safety procedures. We continuously monitor weather conditions and will postpone or relocate tours if there is a risk.
faq.question3: Are there toilets in the tours?
faq.answer3: Flygora uses compost toilets for all adventure tours. They are environmentally friendly and regularly maintained to ensure hygiene.
faq.question4: What type of food is provided in the tours?
faq.answer4: In our tours, Flygora provides a variety of Vietnamese food including local specialties, fresh fruits and nutritious snacks.
faq.question5: What is your policy on tour cancellations and refunds?
faq.answer5: Our policy on tour cancellations and refunds is as follows: If you cancel the tour within a specified time frame, you will receive a full or partial refund depending on the cancellation time. However, if you cancel close to the departure date, a cancellation fee will apply. Please refer to the terms and conditions for each tour for more details.

thunderstorms-lightning.question: How to avoid storms and lightning in tours?
thunderstorms-lightning.answer: We continuously monitor weather conditions and have established safety procedures. Tours may be postponed or rescheduled if dangerous weather conditions are forecast. Our guides are trained to recognize weather patterns and will move the group to a safe area if necessary.

departure-cancellation.question: If I can change the departure date or cancel the tour, what are the policies?
departure-cancellation.answer: Tour cancellation policies vary depending on tour type and timing. Generally, cancellations made 48+ hours in advance receive full refunds, 24-48 hours receive 50% refunds, and less than 24 hours receive no refunds. Weather-related cancellations always receive full refunds or rescheduling options.

join-cannot-swim.question: Am I allowed to join the tour if I can't swim?
join-cannot-swim.answer: Yes, you can join most tours even if you can't swim. We provide life jackets for all water activities and have trained guides to assist. However, some advanced water tours may require basic swimming skills, which will be clearly indicated in the tour description.

skills-needed.question: What skills do I need?
skills-needed.answer: Most tours are designed for beginners and do not require special skills. Basic fitness level and willingness to follow safety instructions are usually sufficient. Advanced tours will specify required skills in their descriptions.

adventure-levels.question: What are the different levels of adventure tours?
adventure-levels.answer: We offer tours from Level 1 (Beginner - family-friendly) to Level 5 (Expert - requiring advanced skills). Each tour is clearly marked with difficulty level, duration and physical requirements.

chemical-shampoo.question: Am I allowed to use chemical shampoo?
chemical-shampoo.answer: We encourage the use of environmentally friendly, biodegradable shampoos to protect the natural environment. Chemical shampoos can harm local ecosystems, especially near water sources. We can suggest suitable alternatives.

shower-place.question: Are there shower facilities during the tour?
shower-place.answer: Shower facilities vary depending on tour type. Day tours typically do not include shower facilities, while overnight tours usually include basic washing areas or access to natural swimming spots. Check your specific tour details.

toilet-facilities.question: Are there toilets during the tour?
toilet-facilities.answer: Basic toilet facilities or designated areas are available on most tours. For wilderness tours, we practice Leave No Trace principles and provide guidance on proper waste disposal.

food-provided.question: What type of food is provided in the tour?
food-provided.answer: We provide nutritious local cuisine including Vietnamese specialties, fresh fruits and energy-rich snacks. Vegetarian options are available with advance notice. All food is prepared to hygiene standards.

bring-camping-gear.question: Do I need to bring my own cave gear and camping equipment?
bring-camping-gear.answer: All necessary safety equipment including helmets, headlamps, ropes and camping gear are provided. You only need to bring personal items like clothing, toiletries and any specific personal preferences.

what-to-notice.question: What should I pay attention to in the tour?
what-to-notice.answer: Always follow guide instructions, stay with the group, wear provided safety equipment, respect local customs and environment, stay hydrated, and immediately notify guides of any health issues.

leeches-jungle.question: Are there leeches in the jungle?
leeches-jungle.answer: Leeches may be present in some forest areas, especially during rainy season. We provide guidance on prevention and removal. They are harmless but can be prevented with appropriate clothing and insect repellent.

medical-condition.question: If I have a medical condition? Can I still join the tour?
medical-condition.answer: Please inform us of any medical conditions when booking. Our guides are trained in first aid, and we can accommodate many conditions with proper preparation. Some serious conditions may prevent participation for safety reasons.

what-to-pack.question: What should I pack for the tour?
what-to-pack.answer: Pack lightweight, quick-dry clothing, sturdy hiking shoes, rain gear, sunscreen, insect repellent, personal toiletries, any medications, and waterproof bags for electronics. We will provide a detailed packing list when booking.

bad-weather-cancellation.question: What happens if bad weather causes tour cancellation?
bad-weather-cancellation.answer: If weather conditions are deemed unsafe, tours will be cancelled or postponed. You will receive a full refund or rescheduling option. Safety is our top priority, and we monitor weather conditions continuously.

payment-booking.question: When do I need to pay in full to confirm a one-day tour booking?
payment-booking.answer: Full payment is required at least 24 hours before the tour date for day tours. For multi-day tours, a 50% deposit secures your booking with full payment due 48 hours before departure.

change-departure-date.question: If I can change the departure date or cancel the tour, what are the policies?
change-departure-date.answer: Departure date changes are subject to availability and may incur fees. Cancellation policy: 48+ hours = full refund, 24-48 hours = 50% refund, less than 24 hours = no refund. Weather cancellations always receive full refunds.

oldFaq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
oldFaq.subtitle: Important information for your trip
oldFaq.question1: What happens if bad weather causes tour cancellation?
oldFaq.answer1: If we have to cancel a tour due to weather, we will notify you as soon as possible and provide alternative options at no additional cost, such as alternative tours, new dates or full refunds.
oldFaq.question2: How to avoid storms and lightning in tours?
oldFaq.answer2: We are aware of the potential risks associated with storms and lightning and have strict safety procedures. We continuously monitor weather conditions and will postpone or relocate tours if there is a risk.
oldFaq.question3: Are there toilets in the tours?
oldFaq.answer3: Jungle Boss uses compost toilets for all adventure tours. They are environmentally friendly and regularly maintained to ensure hygiene.
oldFaq.question4: What type of food is provided in the tours?
oldFaq.answer4: In our tours, Jungle Boss provides a variety of Vietnamese food including local specialties, fresh fruits and nutritious snacks.
oldFaq.question5: Do I need to bring my own cave exploration and camping gear?
oldFaq.answer5: You don't need to bring your own cave exploration or camping gear as Jungle Boss provides all necessary safety equipment including helmets, flashlights and ropes.
oldFaq.question6: Am I allowed to join the tour if I can't swim?
oldFaq.answer6: Absolutely, you will be provided with life jackets to ensure safety during the adventure. Our guides are trained to assist non-swimmers.
oldFaq.answer7: While prior experience in cave exploration, hiking and camping may be beneficial, it is not required. Our tours are designed for all skill levels.
oldFaq.question8: What are the different levels of adventure tours?
oldFaq.answer8: Our tours range from relaxing to extremely adventurous, from Level 1 (Family-friendly) to Level 5 (Expert - requiring advanced skills).

footerIntro.description: Discover the enchantment of Phong Nha-Ke Bang: Unveil legendary caves, ancient forests and crystal-clear rivers. Start your Jungle Boss adventure to experience this enchanting wonderland, immerse yourself in local culture and join us in preserving natural wonders.
